Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lingual antimicrobial peptide (LAP, beta defensin, cattle, ruminant, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the beta-defensin family. LAP/TAP subfamily.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.7886453] Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 29213 (MIC=63-125 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D31 (MIC=16-32 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 27853  (MIC=63-125 μg/ml);Fungi:Candida albicans 14053  (MIC=32-63 μg/ml), Candida tropicalis 13803 (MIC=16-32 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Shows a broad spectrum of antibacterial and antifungal activities.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: In many of the exposed epithelial surfaces including conjunctivae, bronchi, colon, urinary tract and trachea.

Literature.Title: Epithelial antibiotics induced at sites of inflammation.
Literature.Author: Schonwetter BS., Stolzenberg ED., Zasloff MA.

Literature.Title: Epithelial antibiotics induced at sites of inflammation
